trait.name: Death Burst
entries: The rat explodes when it dies. {@actSave con} {@dc 10}, each creature in a 10-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from the rat. {@actSaveFail} {@damage 2d4} Acid {@variantrule Damage|XPHB}. {@actSaveSuccess} Half damage.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 4}, Reach 5 ft. {@h}6 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) Piercing damage or {@damage 1d4 + 2} Piercing damage if the swarm is Bloodied.
